files.help:
The trailing :$JULIA_DEPOT_PATH is necessary. See [292]
export JULIA_DEPOT_PATH="$XDG_DATA_HOME/julia:$JULIA_DEPOT_PATH"
_Relevant issue_: https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/issues/4630
